br.title: Chapter 6 Season 3: SUPER
br.body: Fresh heroes, familiar villains, and all-new ways to power up – Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 3: Super has landed. Get a crash course in superhero-ing, grapple against Mask Maker Daigo, and grow stronger with every battle. The training arc starts now!
br.bodyJa: Fresh heroes, familiar villains, and all-new ways to power up – Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 3: Super has landed. Get a crash course in superhero-ing, grapple against Mask Maker Daigo, and grow stronger with every battle. The training arc starts now!

br.title: Seriously Super Battle Pass
br.body: Super Battle Pass holders can instantly unlock Robin! Earn XP in any Fortnite experience to unlock Supernova Academy classmates, cosmetics, and items for your locker.
br.bodyJa: Super Battle Pass holders can instantly unlock Robin! Earn XP in any Fortnite experience to unlock Supernova Academy classmates, cosmetics, and items for your locker.

br.title: Blitz Royale Live Now
br.body: Drop in with 31 other players and claim a win within 5 minutes! Quick gameplay, short timeline – Blitz Royale updates every week until it leaves on July 15.
br.bodyJa: Drop in with 31 other players and claim a win within 5 minutes! Quick gameplay, short timeline – Blitz Royale updates every week until it leaves on July 15.

br.title: Rise Through the Hero Ranks
br.body: Survive Storm phases and earn eliminations to increase your Hero Rank and power up during every match. Each time you rank up, gain 100 Effective Health and unlock access to increasingly powerful Hero Caches and Boons. Receive all missing Boons when you reach S+ rank!
br.bodyJa: Survive Storm phases and earn eliminations to increase your Hero Rank and power up during every match. Each time you rank up, gain 100 Effective Health and unlock access to increasingly powerful Hero Caches and Boons. Receive all missing Boons when you reach S+ rank!

br.title: Music Pass - Progress Anywhere
br.body: Earn XP from any Fortnite experience to progress the Music Pass. Upgrade to the Premium Reward Track to immediately unlock Die With A Smile Bruno Outfit. Unlock more rewards as you complete the pass!
br.bodyJa: Earn XP from any Fortnite experience to progress the Music Pass. Upgrade to the Premium Reward Track to immediately unlock Die With A Smile Bruno Outfit. Unlock more rewards as you complete the pass!

stw.title: Message of the day update
stw.body: Commanders, we've moved the Save the World message of the day to appear when you first log into Fortnite!
